templates.title: CI/CD Pipeline
templates.code:
graph TD
      subgraph ci [CI Pipeline]
        A[Push Code] --> B{Tests Pass?}
        B -->|Yes| C[Build Image]
        B -->|No| D[Fix & Retry]
        D -.-> A
      end
      C --> E([Deploy Staging])
      E --> F{QA Approved?}
      F -->|Yes| G((Production))
      F -->|No| D

      E -->|Yes| F([Stay inside])
      E -->|No| G([Run for it])

        C([Mobile App]) --> B

        B --> E[User Service]
        B --> F[Order Service]

        E --> H[(User DB)]
        F --> I[(Order DB)]
        F --> J([Message Queue])
      end

templates.title: Class: Full Hierarchy
Class: Inheritance (<|--)
Class: Interface Annotation
Class: MVC Architecture
templates.code:
classDiagram
      class Model {
        -data Map
        +getData() Map
        +setData(key, val) void
        +notify() void
      }
      class View {
        -model Model
        +render() void
        +update() void
      }
      class Controller {
        -model Model
        -view View
        +handleInput(event) void
        +updateModel(data) void
      }
      Controller --> Model : updates
      Controller --> View : refreshes
      View --> Model : reads
      Model ..> View : notifies

templates.title: Sequence
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
    Alice->>+John: Hello John, how are you?
    Alice->>+John: John, can you hear me?
    John-->>-Alice: Hi Alice, I can hear you!
    John-->>-Alice: I feel great!

templates.title: Sequence: Activation Boxes
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant C as Client
      participant S as Server
      C->>+S: Request
      S->>+S: Process
      S->>-S: Done
      S-->>-C: Response

templates.title: Sequence: Actor Stick Figures
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      actor U as User
      participant S as System
      participant DB as Database
      U->>S: Click button
      S->>DB: Query
      DB-->>S: Results
      S-->>U: Display

templates.title: Sequence: Alt/Else Block
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant C as Client
      participant S as Server
      C->>S: Login
      alt Valid credentials
        S-->>C: 200 OK
      else Invalid
        S-->>C: 401 Unauthorized
      else Account locked
        S-->>C: 403 Forbidden
      end

templates.title: Sequence: Arrow Types
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      A->>B: Solid arrow (sync)
      B-->>A: Dashed arrow (return)
      A-)B: Open arrow (async)
      B--)A: Open dashed arrow

templates.title: Sequence: Basic Messages
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob!
      Bob-->>Alice: Hi Alice!

templates.title: Sequence: Critical Block
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant A as App
      participant DB as Database
      A->>DB: BEGIN
      critical Transaction
        A->>DB: UPDATE accounts
        A->>DB: INSERT log
      end
      A->>DB: COMMIT

templates.title: Sequence: Database Transaction
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant C as Client
      participant S as Server
      participant DB as Database
      C->>S: POST /transfer
      S->>DB: BEGIN
      S->>DB: Debit account A
      alt Success
        S->>DB: Credit account B
        S->>DB: INSERT audit_log
        S->>DB: COMMIT
        S-->>C: 200 OK
      else Insufficient funds
        S->>DB: ROLLBACK
        S-->>C: 400 Bad Request
      end

templates.title: Sequence: Loop Block
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant C as Client
      participant S as Server
      C->>S: Connect
      loop Every 30s
        C->>S: Heartbeat
        S-->>C: Ack
      end
      C->>S: Disconnect

templates.title: Sequence: Microservice Orchestration
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant G as Gateway
      participant A as Auth
      participant U as Users
      participant O as Orders
      participant N as Notify
      G->>A: Validate token
      A-->>G: Valid
      par Fetch data
        G->>U: Get user
        U-->>G: User data
      and
        G->>O: Get orders
        O-->>G: Order list
      end
      G->>N: Send notification
      N-->>G: Queued
      Note over G: Aggregate response

templates.title: Sequence: Notes (Right/Left/Over)
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant A as Alice
      participant B as Bob
      Note left of A: Alice prepares
      A->>B: Hello
      Note right of B: Bob thinks
      B-->>A: Reply
      Note over A,B: Conversation complete

templates.title: Sequence: OAuth 2.0 Flow
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      actor U as User
      participant App as Client App
      participant Auth as Auth Server
      participant API as Resource API
      U->>App: Click Login
      App->>Auth: Authorization request
      Auth->>U: Login page
      U->>Auth: Credentials
      Auth-->>App: Authorization code
      App->>Auth: Exchange code for token
      Auth-->>App: Access token
      App->>API: Request + token
      API-->>App: Protected resource
      App-->>U: Display data

templates.title: Sequence: Opt Block
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant A as App
      participant C as Cache
      participant DB as Database
      A->>C: Get data
      C-->>A: Cache miss
      opt Cache miss
        A->>DB: Query
        DB-->>A: Results
        A->>C: Store in cache
      end

templates.title: Sequence: Par Block
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant C as Client
      participant A as AuthService
      participant U as UserService
      participant O as OrderService
      C->>A: Authenticate
      par Fetch user data
        A->>U: Get profile
      and Fetch orders
        A->>O: Get orders
      end
      A-->>C: Combined response

templates.title: Sequence: Participant Aliases
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant A as Alice
      participant B as Bob
      participant C as Charlie
      A->>B: Hello
      B->>C: Forward
      C-->>A: Reply

templates.title: Sequence: Self-Messages
templates.code:
sequenceDiagram
      participant S as Server
      S->>S: Internal process
      S->>S: Validate
      S-->>S: Log

templates.title: Beautiful Mermaid

stateDiagram-v2
        direction LR
        [*] --> Input
        Input --> Parse: DSL
        Parse --> Layout: AST

        Layout --> ASCII: Text
        SVG --> Theme
        ASCII --> Theme

templates.title: State
templates.code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Still
    Still --> [*]
    Still --> Moving
    Moving --> Still
    Moving --> Crash
    Crash --> [*]

templates.title: State: Composite States
templates.code:
stateDiagram-v2
      [*] --> Idle
      Idle --> Processing : submit
      state Processing {
        parse --> validate
        validate --> execute
      }
      Processing --> Complete : done
      Processing --> Error : fail
      Error --> Idle : retry
      Complete --> [*]

templates.title: State: Connection Lifecycle
templates.code:
stateDiagram-v2
      [*] --> Closed
      Closed --> Connecting : connect
      Connecting --> Connected : success
      Connecting --> Closed : timeout
      Connected --> Disconnecting : close
      Connected --> Reconnecting : error
      Reconnecting --> Connected : success
      Reconnecting --> Closed : max_retries
      Disconnecting --> Closed : done
      Closed --> [*]

templates.title: Kanban
templates.code:
---
config:
  kanban:
    ticketBaseUrl: 'https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/issues/#TICKET#'
---
kanban
  Todo
    [Create Documentation]
    docs[Create Blog about the new diagram]
  [In progress]
    id6[Create renderer so that it works in all cases. We also add some extra text here for testing purposes. And some more just for the extra flare.]
  id9[Ready for deploy]
    id8[Design grammar]@{ assigned: 'knsv' }
  id10[Ready for test]
    id4[Create parsing tests]@{ ticket: 2038, assigned: 'K.Sveidqvist', priority: 'High' }
    id66[last item]@{ priority: 'Very Low', assigned: 'knsv' }
  id11[Done]
    id5[define getData]
    id2[Title of diagram is more than 100 chars when user duplicates diagram with 100 char]@{ ticket: 2036, priority: 'Very High'}
    id3[Update DB function]@{ ticket: 2037, assigned: knsv, priority: 'High' }
  id12[Can't reproduce]
    id3[Weird flickering in Firefox]
